EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-09-1-Path to Hybrid Cloud Commercial Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Whitepaper] Is Your Path To The Hybrid Cloud Clear?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-pros-cons-clouds-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp-path-to-hybrid-cloud&utm_content=09012017]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, The hybrid cloud has been heralded as a promising IT operational model enabling enterprises to maintain security and control over the infrastructure on which their applications run. At the same time, it promises to maximize ROI from their local data center and leverage public cloud infrastructure for an occasional demand spike. This whitepaper explores a brief history of hybrid cloud, some of the existing public cloud offerings, the challenges with the public cloud and how to properly navigate the transition. <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-pros-cons-clouds-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp-path-to-hybrid-cloud&utm_content=09012017]]> - The Turbonomic Team
